1.content: It was one of those days, you hated every moment. The day started out well, until you got to school. When you walked in the door, your mom called saying the dog got ran over.Then at lunch your Amanda wanted to talk, she didn't explain why but she broke up with you, tearing up as she walked away. Not just that, but you had failed a test earlier and would fail 2 more later in the day. By the time you got home, you didn't want to do anything you were so depressed. You skipped out on dinner, your mom tried everything to get you out of your room but nothing worked. It was about 10 at night when you finally said aloud, "I wish I could be someone else....". The Lights shut off, and a glow came from outside your door. It grew more intense as it approached your door. The door flew wide open, a beautiful spirit appeared. Her hair flowed down past her back, her clothes like a roman goddess, she glowed a bright white, illuminating your entire room. She spoke softly, "If you truly wish to be someone else, I will grant it." You nodded in awe. "I will show you how you are living in other dimensions, for I cannot disrupt someone else's life." she seemed to whisper but her voice filled the room. She waved her hand over your bed, 5 items appeared. A hairbrush, a football, a guitar, a gold wristband, and a mysterious box. "Touch one, and view how the you who owns it lives." the spirit said soothingly. Which did you choose?
1.title: One of those days....

11.content:
Out of curiosity, you touched the hairbrush. The other items vanished and she waved her hand over you. You were enveloped in a blinding light. When you came too, you were lying on a bed. You sat up and looked around, the room was very girly. The floor was covered in a dark purple shag carpet. On the back of the door to the hallway hung a short pink robe. On the wall were posters of male actors and singers. On the end of the bed was a pile of stuffed animals. You pulled the purple and black covers off of yourself and stood up. You noticed that you were at least 6 inches shorter. You noticed the weight on your chest and peered down. You saw the two mounds protruding from your chest. They were covered by a white tank top. You looked farther down to see pink sweatpants. You finally looked in the mirror, you saw a cute teenage brunette. Her hair a light brown, in long elegant waves. Freckles were scattered across her face in a cute fashion. Her eyes a beautiful green, you kinda got lost in them until you remembered that girl was an alternate version of yourself. So you were mesmerized by yourself. The room got dark, then bright again. You turned to see the spirit behind you. "You will now observe for one day how this you lives, when the day is done I will reappear to you." she said calmly fading away. The lights turning back on.

"Nicole, hurry up and get ready for school!" your mother said from downstairs.

"Alright mom, be down in a sec." your body replied. It started to move on its own towards the closet. You were confused until you remembered that the spirit said you would observe this life for a day, not live it. Your body opened up the closet, you could feel everything your body could. "Umm what would be cute today?" your body said. Then your body grabbed a v-neck sweater, pink and black stripes. Then it grabbed a jean mini-skirt. Quickly your body stripped revealing a bright green bra and panties. It slid the skirt up, and put a laced tank top on under the stripped v-neck sweater. Your body sat down in the mirror, it grabbed the brush the spirit showed you and brushed its hair. Then it did it's makeup, grabbed a purse and headed downstairs, slipping on some pink flip flops.

"Cute!" your mom said. She seemed much skinnier in this universe, you almost hated to say that she was almost more beautiful too.

"Thanks mom!" your body said hugging your mom good morning after walking down the stairs. You could feel your breasts bounce on every step. They had to be at least C sized. Your body sat down, ate some cereal and then left for school........
11.title: The Hairbrush

"Hey Mitch," your body said, "Good luck tonight."

He turned, but your body wouldn't make eye contact with him, "Thanks, cheer hard for me okay?" he asked. Your face flushed again and your head nodded and giggled an "Okay" It then turned to look at Kate as if to celebrate.

12.content:
Feeling drawn towards the football, you wonder if you were a sports star in that parallel life. Imagining yourself as fitter than you've ever been, faster and healthier your hand reaches towards the ball.

Pausing just before touching it, you look over the other options, each of them with same pearly-white glow around them.

"Your life may not be easier there, but it will be different." the Goddess warns.

A frown forms and fades, as you try to work out if she meant just the football, or from the choice itself. With your arm still outstretched, you try and read her face, perhaps you're meant to show wisdom in not abandoning your current life.

Her face is gorgeous, full pursed lips, a slim nose, and wide eyes of pale blue. But her expression gives you no hint what to do.

The idea of being a jock, rather than their victim was appealing. Cole decided that that was his test, could he be better than his tormentors. Would he rise higher, be kinder.

Nodding to himself, sure of himself, he reached out and touched the ball. The glow intensified becoming a blinding white light, it washed out the bed, the bedroom, until Cole squeezed his eyes shut against the painful light. Even now, it showed red through his screwed closed eyes.

Then it vanished.

Opening his eyes, Cole took in his new reality, a who different dimension.
12.title: The soccer ball.

152211123.content:
There was an attack of some yet unknown enemy ship and you are shaken inside the turbo lift.
Also this man, who is with you is in the same situation….
Being inside a turbo lift while an attack is not a nice situation, especially when you are a woman and have a horny man very close to you!
You hated every moment and wanted to get out.
And you are lucky the turbo lift reached the bridge and the doors opened:
When you walked through the door, your star trek fan dream come true, you are on the bridge of the USS Enterprise and see all your idols around: Captain Kirk, Spock, Uhura, Sulu and Chekov, also Scotty and Bones….
But the situation was not the best, in the middle of an enemy attack!
There was a bombardment ongoing and luckily the Enterprise went out as winner of this fight:
All of this was happening in about 10 minutes in total. Then the captain was relaxed again and as he turned around to ask for the report he saw you: The hot young woman and you know at least from the TV show, how much of a womanizer captain Kirk is…
"I wish I could be someone else...." you thin, but the door to the bridge opened again as another female crew member entered. She was wearing a blue uniform, meaning she must have some science position:
The captain and all around saw her a beautiful appearance:
Her hair flowed down past her back, her clothes emphasized her female body shape, her teeth glowed a bright white, while she presented her perfect smile…
152211123.title: Unexpectedly, the ship rocks as it is hit with ...

choices: Your arse gets a resounding slap. "Perfect." a gruff voice approves.
You head back the safety of your own quarters.
It's all too much, and you faint dead away.
15222.content:
"Is it.. Is this real?" you ask.

Almost as if sensing your doubt, the deckplan starts to fade before your eyes. The future with those miniskirted women vanishing before your eyes. It was a simpler time, a more sexist time. You want a slice of that. To command respect, and have the women at your beck and call.

You recall, the few women, and their subordinate positions. Eager to serve their superior.

Just before the deckplan fades, your hand darts out snatching it to your chest.

Instantly, you feel your old clothes fading away, as you merge with your new reality. You see a flash of red, and feel a twinge of regret, you don't want to be a Red-shirt. Not in Kirk's universe.

As if sensing your doubts, your hesitation. The sleeve fades, even as you become more solid, more a part of the world of the Enterprise. You feel the breeze from the ventilation caress your skin. A smile forms, even if a little tight, this will be an incredible experience.

You reach a hand cautiously out, and touch the wall. It's cold and metallic, but pulses in time with the engines. More than that you notice something even more important.

http://40.media.tumblr.com/6b5891d2eef30...

You are a female crew member. You swallow the nervous squeak building in your throat. Worse than that, you don't see any rank markings, and your uniform is very different from your expectations. Instincts, and knowledge flood your brain, as your mental changes catch up with your physical ones.
15222.title: ask for some details

choices: ask for more details and the way back
154.content:
You see some flask and you also can smell the content, nice perfume…
Then you also see some room, which is very similar to your room, no it is actually your room, there is only this vanity table, where the flask and other female items are placed…
This is definitely a girl’s room and you ask the spirit, what this reality is about. She said this is the reality where you have been born as a girl. She also offers you to jump into that dimension for some time if you like.
You ask. “What does this exactly mean?”
She explained: “you will have the body of this girl for the time we agree and live her life. Do you want it?”
154.title: A Flask

1541.content:
Without further asking or thinking you give in your curiosity and accept the deal.
The spirit glows in a shining white light and you have to close your eyes to be not blended. When you open your eyes again….
1541.title: accept the deal

15411.content: The spirit is still there while you try to adapt to your new feelings. Having now indeed a girl’s body is strange and unusual for you, but you kind of like it. Now the spirit asked you for how long you want to live the life of the female you?
15411.title: you are the girl you

1551.title: Eye Mask (Superhero/Villian)

15511.content:
Cole wondered ' What is like being a superhero' and hesitated to put it on. The Spirit said Go ahead...it is not permanent yet.

Then he put it on. The room was spinning around for a second. Then Cole found himself as a girl. His boobs were not big but he was very slim. Around the room, was trophies of martial arts competitions that he /she won against other heroes.

He flexed and discovered that his/her biceps was very noticeable too.

The spirit said to him " Sorry you are not as strong as Superman but you can reasonably lift a tank. In addition, you have one more major power besides physical strength.

Cole said ' What is it?'
15511.title: Superhero

155331.content:
Being a huge Harry Potter fan, at least of the movies, you select the magic wand and ask the ghost how this item works.
She tells you when you wave with it you are transferred into another dimension, where you are…
155331.title: Yes

1553311.content:
Yes, Yes, Yes, I am in the Harry Potter world at Hogwarts Cole was so excited and looked around the room. Cole was just about to be sorted in a few minutes. But he wondered which one was the DADA professor? He frowned ' oh no, Quirrrel. I better read some of the true DADA books in the library.'

Cole heard his name called as Ron. The Sorting Hat was stunned Very Interesting Very Interesting Who do we have here... Cole/Don said ' Do you know how I got here'

The Sorting Hat replied ' oh yes, you will have a chance to redeem the earlier Ron's behavior....Gryffindor !!!

Cole/Ron was excited and sat down next to

info.brief_description: One day Cole gets his chance to see how his other lives live.
info.description:
Ever had such a bad day that you wished you were someone else? Well Cole has, in one day his dog died, his girlfriend broke up with him, he failed 3 tests and was shoved into a locker. When he finally got home, he couldn't do anything but lie in bed wishing he were someone else. Well he would have that chance today. For a magical spirit heard his plea and offered him a chance to view his lives in other dimension's. If he thought that what he saw was better, then he could have the chance to change his current life for one of his other lives.

Cole: You: 17 year old, medium height, slender build, acne problem, introverted guy.

Amanda: Cole's ex-girlfriend. Short, outgoing, blonde, girly girl.

Other characters can be added as necessary. Try to keep good grammar. Also try to keep entries longer than 3 sentences. If there is something I don't like I will change or delete, but I'll be very lenient on that. Have fun, enjoy!!
